puerto_rikan.text: Men are like bears, the uglier they are, the more gorgeous they are.
Break the leg of a bad habit.
Break the leg of a bad habit.
Who gossips to you will gossip of you.
You can't kill a dog just to save a cat's tail.
You may light another's candle with your own without loss.
Sleeping shrimp gets taken by the current.
The best thing God did was to make one day follow another.
The day after is the student of the day before.
The monkey knows the tree it climbs.
The night forms a cover for sinners.
There is a great distance between said and done.
There is not the thickness of a peso between good and evil.
There's a risk in every jump.
What might not happen in a year might happen in an instant.
When you talk about the sun, you will see her beams.
He who lacks ideas makes those of others his own.
He who was born for a small loaf, will never own a big one.
Hurriedness is not necessarily the daughter of foolishness, and delay is not necessarily the daughter of cowardice.
I will do anything except bear the responsibility of guarding a house that has two doors.
In the boss's eyes you'll always see ambition.
It is not enough for a man to know how to ride, he must also know how to fall.
Love is deed and not fine phrases.
Never say no due to pride, or yes due to weakness.
Silence was never written down.
Silk is cut best with old scissors.
A good beginning is half the work done.
Although the monkey might dress in silk, monkey it still is.
Always a bridesmaid, never a bride.
Break the leg of a bad habit.
Calling the devil is not the same as seeing him come.
Do not fear a stain that disappears with water.
Eat the bread of the man you hate and also of him you love.
God's greatest act was to make one day follow another.
He who excuses himself, accuses himself.
He who has servants has unavoidable enemies.
The worst thing you can do is not try
Do not fear a stain that disappears with water
You are master over what you hush, and slave to what you speak…
That which does not kill, makes you fat…
Appearances can be deceiving.
There is no chaos that good cannot come from
After a storm comes a calm.
puerto_rikan.description: I know things are difficult now, but soon things will get better and easier.

puerto_rikan.text: Lying and eating fish, one must be very careful…
The keeper of the orchard’s dog, that neither eats, nor will let anyone eat
Curiosity killed the cat.
puerto_rikan.description: A polite way of telling someone to “Mind your own business”. Pay attention to your own life, ignore things that don’t concern you.

puerto_rikan.text: A tiger doesn’t change its stripes.
An idle mind is the devil’s workshop.
You can’t kill a dog just to save a cat’s tail.
Be happy with what you’ve got.
A chain is only as strong as its weakest link.
puerto_rikan.description: While this proverb is not talking about a literal chain, it does refer to a situation or group of people that will crumble when the weakest part of that group crumbles. A good example of this would be, if a group were to build a human pyramid, there could be 14 very strong people who will build the pyramid and keep it standing but a 15th person who was weaker than the rest, once they falter, they cause a snowball effect, making the rest of the pyramid collapse. In essence, the proverb teaches us that in any situation, we should make sure that all components are strong or else the entire operation will fail.

puerto_rikan.text: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush .
puerto_rikan.description: It's better to hold onto something you have rather than take the risk of getting something better which may come to nothing.

puerto_rikan.text: After marriage, life goes downhill.
All bark and no bite.
A man is known by the company he keeps.
The Devil knows more because of his age than because he’s the devil…
Better the devil you know than the devil you don’t know.
